title: changing my email
body: i would like to change my email because my old one was deleted. But its not letting me change it because it keeps sending the code to my old email which i dont have anymore. please help!

replies.body:
We can assist you in sorting this out if you reach out to our account specialists in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know!
